snippet: A group of six swimmers claimed a world record of about 236 miles for open-water relay distance swimming, crossing the eastern Mediterranean from Cyprus to Israel.
abstract: Group of six swimmers claim world record of about 236 miles for open-water relay distance swimming, crossing the eastern Mediterranean from Cyprus to Israel.
lead_paragraph: A group of six swimmers claimed a world record of about 236 miles for open-water relay distance swimming, crossing the eastern Mediterranean from Cyprus to Israel.
